question: How many cysteines have alpha-defensins?
ideal_answer: Alpha defensins contain six cysteines, which form three well defined disulfide bridges under oxidizing conditions.

snippets.text: Alpha defensins contain six cysteines, which form three well defined disulfide bridges under oxidizing conditions.
All three kinds of defensins have six conserved cysteines
There are six cysteines in the sequence of mature CFBD peptide,
They typically contain six conserved cysteines whose three intramolecular disulfides stabilize a largely β-sheet structure.

exact_answer: Alpha defensins contain six conserved cysteines
